holidays.title: National Hammock Day
holidays.description: The universal symbol for relaxation is celebrated today!

holidays.title: Casual Pi Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Casual Pi Day today by flaunting your arithmetic prowess!

holidays.title: Lion's Share Day
holidays.description: Get ready to take more than your fair share on this special occasion!

holidays.title: Mango Day
holidays.description: Devour and savor mangoes this summer by making special treats and learning more about the fruit.

holidays.title: National Day of the Cowboy
holidays.description: Cowboy culture, despite the misconception that it has faded away, is alive and well.

holidays.title: National Fragile X Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more and raise awareness about Fragile X syndrome today.

holidays.title: National Penuche Fudge Day
holidays.description: Penuche is a fudge made with butter, milk, and brown sugar and flavored lightly with vanilla.

holidays.title: NATIONAL RAT CATCHER’S DAY
holidays.description: Better treat your local rodent exterminator right, or else the consequences will be severe!

holidays.title: National Sophia Day
holidays.description: Let’s take a trip through time and examine the lives of some prominent Sophias.

holidays.title: National Thomas Day
holidays.description: Thomas is a name with a mercurial personality and amazing achievements. Read on to learn more.

holidays.title: Pi Approximation Day
holidays.description: Pi or pie, whether you’re a baker or a math whiz, today is your day.

holidays.title: Sarawak Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Sarawakian independence on Sarawak Day this July 22!

holidays.title: Spoonerism Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate by embracing the entertaining task of spoonerizing your narrative!

holidays.title: Toss Away the “Could Haves” and “Should Haves” Day
holidays.description: Take control of your future by avoiding dwelling on your past mistakes.

holidays.title: World Brain Day
holidays.description: Prepare to develop new habits and maintain optimal brain health.

holidays.title: Selena Gomez’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate Selena Gomez, one of America's biggest pop stars.

holidays.title: David Spade’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this versatile and talented Hollywood star, the sky is an attainable limit.

holidays.title: Larray’s Birthday
holidays.description: Larray is known for his sass, and he throws shade like it's confetti!

holidays.title: Max Boyd’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper is cementing his path to superstardom one song at a time!

holidays.title: Shawn Michaels’s Birthday
holidays.description: This extremely strong wrestling champion knows how to win inside and outside the ring!

holidays.title: This Trippy Hippie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet This Trippy Hippie — the poster child of “triumph over adversity” and an online inspiration.
